companyInfo.name: About Us - MilGPT
companyInfo.description: MilGPT combines cutting-edge AI with practical tools to simplify workflows, spark creativity, and unlock new opportunities for individuals and businesses worldwide.
companyInfo.mission: To empower people by making AI technology practical, accessible, and trustworthy in solving everyday challenges.

history.title: Research Project
history.description: MilGPT started as a small research project exploring how AI could enhance real-world productivity beyond simple chat interfaces.

history.title: AI Assistant Launch
history.description: Our first beta release introduced MilGPT as an AI assistant focused on content creation, coding help, and research support.

history.title: Global Expansion
history.description: With growing adoption, MilGPT expanded its reach, introducing advanced integrations and multilingual capabilities for users worldwide.

team.name: Sarah Chen
team.bio: With over 15 years of experience in the industry, Sarah leads our company with vision and passion for innovation.

team.name: Marcus Rodriguez
team.bio: Technology expert with a background in AI and machine learning. Marcus drives our technical innovation forward.

team.name: Priya Patel
team.bio: Creative visionary with an eye for detail. Priya ensures our products are both beautiful and functional.

team.name: David Kim
team.bio: Strategic marketer with a proven track record of building successful brands and engaging audiences.

team.name: Elena Petrova
team.bio: Full-stack developer specializing in React and Node.js. Elena brings complex ideas to life with clean code.

team.name: James Wilson
team.bio: Product strategist who bridges the gap between technical teams and customer needs.

team.name: Aisha Bello
team.bio: User advocate who ensures our products meet real user needs through rigorous research and testing.
